SCHEDULE_ADJUSTED_ADD_DAY: Adjusting scheduled time ({0}) because it's earlier than now ({1}). Adding 1 day.
NON_ELEVATED_ATTEMPT: Process running without administrative rights — attempting to create a task for current user without elevation.
SCHEDULE_USER_ONCE_FAILED: Creating ONCE task for current user failed; will proceed with API/fallback.
IMPORT_XML_FAILED: Import XML failed; will try Register-ScheduledTask fallback.
SCHEDULE_SETTINGS_INFO: Note: task created with 'StartWhenAvailable' (will run soon if start was missed). WakeToRun is OFF (the PC will not wake).
SCHEDULE_API_FAILED: ScheduledTasks API failed: {0}. Will fallback to schtasks.exe
SCHTASKS_FALLBACK_NOTE: Note: fallback ONCE task created; also created ONSTART and ONLOGON fallback tasks.
SCHTASKS_EXITCODE: schtasks returned code {0} when creating ONCE task.
IPAPI_FAIL: Warning: Failed to determine location via ipapi.
NO_LOCATION_FALLBACK_USING_LOC: Warning: No location or cache found. Using fallback coordinates {0}.
NO_LOCATION_FALLBACK_HARD: Warning: No location or cache found. Using London fallback coordinates.
PARSE_SUN_WARN: Cannot parse API results (possibly polar day/night or invalid values): {0}
TZ_MAP_WARN: Warning: Cannot convert timezone '{0}' to Windows ID: {1}. Using local timezone instead.
EVENTS_PASSED: One or more events already happened today (sunrise={0}, sunset={1}). Querying for tomorrow's times...
CANNOT_GET_NEXTDAY: Failed to get next day's times: {0}
SUN_API_FAIL: Warning: Failed to get sun times from API or parsing error: {0}
CACHE_STILL_PAST: Cached times are still in the past after shifting. Scheduling retry tomorrow at 03:00.
NO_SUITABLE_CACHE: No suitable cache found. Cannot continue.
SUNSET_STILL_PAST: Sunset is still in the past ({0}) — adding 1 day as last resort.
SUNRISE_STILL_PAST: Sunrise is still in the past ({0}) — adding 1 day as last resort.
SCHEDULED_DONE: Done. Next switch has been scheduled.
SCHEDULE_FAILED_GENERIC: Done. BUT: Failed to create scheduled task (probably insufficient privileges).
ELEVATED_INSTRUCTIONS: Instruction to run elevated (will open new PowerShell with UAC prompt):
SCHTASKS_EXAMPLE_CMD: Example command to create the task manually (run as admin):
RUN_ELEVATED_SUGGEST: If you want, run the Start-Process command above or open PowerShell as admin and run the script again with -Schedule.
CONFIG_VALIDATION_SKIPPED: Config validation function not available; skipping executable checks.
